summary: Adds a Standalone Follower Meia. (CBBE Exclusive)
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ffff][size=4][b]=Description= [/b][/size][/color]
This Mod adds a Follower who is marriageable and can be found in The Bannered Mare.
There's nothing really unique about this follower mod compared to my other followers mod,
Except that she is the first Skyrim mod I've ever made using CK. Just being sentimental and decided to share it~
She starts off with 2 differently enchanted Blades Sword & a Necklace enchanted with Muffle.
[color=#6d9eeb]
[/color][b][size=4][color=#00ffff]=Backstory=[/color]
[/size][/b]Meia is a daughter of two Blades members who escaped to Skyrim after the fall of The Blades. A few month after being born her parents gave her away to another Blades comrade in concern for her safety, after realizing that they can no longer run from the Thalmor. Meia is a special Child who was born with a mark which signifies the coming of an important event. She now travels all over Skyrim to fulfill her destiny, to find and assist The Dragonborn to beat The World Eater.
[color=#00ffff]
[size=4][b]=Changelog=[/b][/size][/color]
v1.1: Fixed wrong texture path for face (includes amulet fix)
Hotfix: Added a hotfix for bugged amulet.
v1.0: Initial Release.
[b][color=#00ffff]
[size=4]=Stats=[/size][/color]
[/b]Gender: Female
Height: 0.975
Weight: 20
Race: Nord 
Voice: Female Eventoned
Body Type: CBBE (Exclusive)
Class: Assassin/Nightblade (Alternates between Dual Wield & 1H+Spell)
Proficiency: One-handed, Light Armor, Sneaking, Destruction
Known Spells: Frostbite, Healing, Ice Spike, Frost Cloak
Location: Bannered Mare, Whiterun
[color=#00ffff]
[size=4][b]=Requirements=[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
 (Prevents weird body mesh behavior & The ONLY reason for your game to CTD if you have this mod without it!)

[b][color=#00ffff][size=4]=Not Required but HIGHLY Recommended=[/size][/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Followers Tweak[/url]
(For many reasons...Check the mod page for more information)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO [/url]
(To make Meia be more talkative instead of a soulless husk following you around)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is your home[/url]
(To set change her default location to somewhere else other than her original location)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17483/?]Magical Markers[/url]
(Give this to her before dismissing her to know where she is after being dismissed)

[color=#00ffff][size=4][b]=Installation=[/b][/size][/color]
Drop all the files in Skyrim/Data folder

[b][color=#00ffff][size=4]=Conflicts & Bugs=[/size][/color][/b]
Should be none but may be possible with any mods that alters Bannered Mare interior.

[b][color=#00ffff][size=4]=Credits=[/size][/color][/b]
[b]Ousnius and Caliente[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- [/url]

[b]Laxi2610[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4529]CBBE Slim Tribal Tattoos[/url]
[b]DD Akt[/b] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url]
[b]tktk1 [/b]for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit
[/url][b]lautasantenni[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361/?]Expanded Jewelry Crafting[/url]

author: ZReincarnation
